October 4, 2024  —  MAGA Republicans are now lying about the federal response to Hurricane Helene in much the same way they lied about Haitian migrants bringing chaos and disease to Springfield, Ohio.  Both disinformation efforts are flat-out lies, and both are designed to demonize immigrants.

For First Time in 20 Years, Purdue Won't Have Election Day Polling Place on Campus  —  Purdue University in Indiana will not have an Election Day polling place this year.  The Tippecanoe County Election Board decided not to hold one, even though the campus has had one during the last four presidential elections.
